channel.title: Help with adding login box and buttons

item.title: Help with adding login box and buttons
item.dc:creator: @wicksy wicksy
item.description:
@wicksy wrote:

Ok well i am following this tut - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,332018.0.html
I have the sprits in the right place still named the same and when i add this and compile i get errors.

[code]else if (s.equalsIgnoreCase(“titlebutton”))
{
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(".fub_file_store_32/Sprites/loginbutton.png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

				}
				catch (Exception exception)
				{
					System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
				}
			}

else if (s.equalsIgnoreCase(“titlebox”))
{
try
{
Image image = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit().getImage(".fub_file_store_32/Sprites/loginbox.png"); //System.getProperty(“user.dir”) + “\”+i+".png");
anIntArray1439 = new int[anInt1440 * anInt1441];
PixelGrabber pixelgrabber = new PixelGrabber(image, 0, 0, anInt1440, anInt1441, anIntArray1439, 0, anInt1440);
pixelgrabber.grabPixels();

		}
		catch (Exception exception)
		{
			System.out.println(((Object) (exception)));
		}
	}[/code]

The error i get is class30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java:1076:'else' without 'if' else if (s.equalsignoarcase("titlebutton")) ^ clas30_sub2_sub1_sub1.java:1123: 'else' without 'if' else if (s.startswith("backbase1") && i == O) ^ 2 errors Finished!

so idk what im doing wrong it would probably easier if i gave you the file and you added it right. Also yes i am using fubergens client. Thanks and whoever helps me fix this ill rep
